participant_1.background:
I love to dance my heart out at concerts when I have free time.
i enjoy golfing.
I have a truck for my weekend adventures and a leased car for my daily commute.
i am from austin , texas.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.

participant_2.background:
I'm trying to appreciate the simple things in life, like the weather.
I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.
I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
i like to water ski.

content.text: How are you doing today?
Good, thanks for asking! How are you doing?
I am doing well, thank you. I am from Austin, TX. Where are you from?
I'm originally from the Midwest, but I've lived in Austin for a few years now.
Nice! What brought you to Austin?
I came here for school, and I just fell in love with the city.
I'm glad you like it here! It's a great city.
Yeah, it's pretty awesome. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, golf, and go camping.
I love to go to concerts too! I'm actually pregnant with my second child, so I haven't been to one in a while.
Congratulations! That's great news.
Thanks! I'm really excited.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
That's great! I'm glad you're taking an active role in your health.
Thanks! I try to be.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm going to the park with my kids. We're going to have a picnic and play on the playground.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope you have a great time.
Thanks! I'm sure we will.
You're welcome!
